thread.section_title: Matboard and More Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Matboard and More | matboardandmore.com | 3 of 135
thread.title: Chris, NC
thread.title_full: Matboard and More reviewed by Chris, NC

author: Chris, NC
title: Chris, NC
text:
The mats I ordered were absolutely perfect. High quality, clean cuts to my exact specifications. Fit great and looked great. I will order from matboardandmore.com again.
The only reason I withhold the fifth star is the shipping which, in all fairness, is not completely under the control of matboardandmore.com
At $14.95 for shipping, you'd think shipping would be quicker than 8 days. My delivery date was even pushed back a day. I'd suggest shipping with fedex or ups... btw, mats were packaged very well.
